Plot: An English Duke from 1876 is inadvertedly dragged to modern day New York where he falls for a plucky advertising executive.
Title: Kate & Leopold
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.
Actors: Meg Ryan, Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Breckin Meyer
Writer: Steven Rogers (story), James Mangold (screenplay), Steven Rogers (screenplay)
